```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r}
library(pirouette)
```

```{r}
phylogeny <- ape::read.tree(text = "(((A:1, B:1):1, C:2):1, D:3);")
twin <- create_twin_tree(phylogeny)
```


```{r fig.width=7, fig.height=7}
babette::plot_densitree(
  phylos = c(phylogeny, twin), 
  col = c("red", "gray"), 
  width = c(2, 4),
  consensus = phylogeny
)
```
